Rulings.Edison:
●Remember that you can't shuffle your GY or change the order of cards in your GY at any time.
●If a monster is named with Question that could not be Special Summoned, Question’s effect disappears and the monster is neither Special Summoned nor removed from play. So the effect of Question disappears if the bottom monster is incorrectly named and is Helpoemer, Dark Ruler Ha Des, etc.
●If you would Special Summon Tyrant Dragon from the GY using Question, you must Tribute 1 Dragon and if you can't you can't Special Summon Tyrant Dragon and the effect of Question disappears.
Rulings.Tengu:
●Remember that you cannot shuffle your GY or change the order of cards in your GY at any time.
●If a monster is named with Question that could not be Special Summoned, Question’s effect disappears and the monster is neither Special Summoned nor removed from play. So the effect of Question disappears if the bottom monster is incorrectly named and is Helpoemer, Dark Ruler Ha Des, etc.
●If you would Special Summon Tyrant Dragon from the GY using Question, you must Tribute 1 Dragon and if you cannot you cannot Special Summon Tyrant Dragon and the effect of Question disappears.
Rulings.Goat:
●Remember that you cannot shuffle your GY or change the order of cards in your GY at any time.
●If a monster is named with Question that could not be Special Summoned, Question’s effect disappears and the monster is neither Special Summoned nor removed from play. So the effect of Question disappears if the bottom monster is incorrectly named and is Helpoemer, Dark Ruler Ha Des, etc.
●If you would Special Summon Tyrant Dragon from the GY using Question, you must Tribute 1 Dragon and if you cannot you cannot Special Summon Tyrant Dragon and the effect of Question disappears. If a monster that has Special Summon requirements that was not properly Summoned is at the bottom of the GY when “Question” is activated, that monster will not be Special Summoned. 
●If the opposing player activates a card that alters the GY in a chain with “Question,” that player may still not look in the player who activated “Question’s” GY.

Rulings.Base: 1. Remember that you cannot shuffle your GY or change the order of cards in your GY at any time.\n2. If a monster is named with "Question" that could not be Special Summoned, the effect of "Question" disappears and the monster is neither Special Summoned nor removed from play. So the effect of "Question" disappears if the bottom monster is incorrectly named and is "Helpoemer", "Dark Ruler Ha Des", etc.\n3. If you would Special Summon "Tyrant Dragon" from the GY using "Question", you must Tribute 1 Dragon and if you cannot you cannot Special Summon "Tyrant Dragon" and the effect of "Question" disappears.

PSCT.Base: When activating this card, your opponent cannot check cards in the Graveyard. Your opponent calls the name of the first monster found at the bottom of your Graveyard. If he/she calls it right, the monster is removed from play. If he/she calls it wrong, the monster is Special Summoned to your side of the field.
